name: Maha Tuning
text: This card can only be equipped to a "Maha" monster. If this card is activated: You can add 1 Equip Spell card from your Deck to your hand. If the monster this card is equipped to would leave the field, you can send this card to the GY instead. The equipped monster gains 500 ATK for each card equipped to it. The equipped monster gains this effect: "You can send 1 Equip Spell card from your hand or field to the GY; this card can attack again.".
